title: Goodbye, Fairy - Novel Updates
author: Yonezawa Honobu
description:
April, 1991. The sudden appearance of a single girl taking shelter from the rain brought us days upon days of endless wonder. Her name was Maja, and she came from a faraway land. Since that moment, we spent our days with her, each one bounding with mystery. After she returned to her country, however, was when our greatest mystery began, and the key to solving it rests somewhere within our memories. This is the story of an unforgettable meeting and a prayer.

First book in the Beruf series.>
